class.name: SteamMultiplayerPeer
class.brief_description: Provides a bridge between Steam Networking Sockets and Godot's high level [MultiplayerAPI].
class.description: A [MultiplayerPeer] implementation that connects Steam Networking Sockets to Godot's high level multiplayer API. Should be passed to [MultiplayerAPI].multiplayer_peer after being initialized by calling create_lobby or connect_lobby.

link.title: GodotSteam and SteamMultiplayerPeer - article by Michael Macha

method.name: create_lobby
method.description: Creates a lobby of given with set privacy type and set maximum player amount. Signal lobby_created will be emitted after lobby creation.

method.name: connect_lobby
method.description: Connect to the Steam lobby by given lobby ID. Signal lobby_joined will be emitted after attempting to connect.

method.name: get_steam64_from_peer_id
method.description: Converts peer ID of MultiplayerAPI's current multiplayer_peer into Steam user ID.

method.name: get_peer_id_from_steam64
method.description: Converts Steam user ID into peer ID of MultiplayerAPI's current multiplayer_peer.

method.name: set_lobby_joinable
method.description: Sets whether or not a lobby is joinable by other players. This always defaults to enabled for a new lobby. If joining is disabled, then no players can join, even if they are a friend or have been invited. Lobbies with joining disabled will not be returned from a lobby search.

signal.name: lobby_created
signal.description: Gets emitted after creating a lobby and a game server. Creator automatically joins the lobby. Provided that result is [Steam].Result.RESULT_OK, callback for this signal would be a good moment to assign the peer to [MultiplayerAPI] by calling multiplayer.set_multiplayer_peer().

signal.name: lobby_joined
signal.description: Received upon attempting to enter a lobby. Lobby metadata is available to use immediately after receiving this. Provided that result is [Steam].ChatRoomEnterResponse.CHAT_ROOM_ENTER_RESPONSE_SUCCESS, callback for this signal would be a good moment to assign the peer to [MultiplayerAPI] by calling multiplayer.set_multiplayer_peer().
